name: Apprentice Quest
description:
Apprentice yourself to the Great Witch of the realm & help her complete a ritual of dire importance.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z: Use item/Talk/Interact
  • X: Switch items

Inspired by

  • Rick and Morty
  • I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream
  • The Walking Dead
  • Games by Spiderweb Software
